title: 【一日多萬五單】諾域治 對 利物浦 7

replies.msg:
Klopp has an excellent relationship w/ BVB sporting director Michael Zorc, and especially CEO Joachim Watzke. Nike could potentially help in order to launch Nike x LFC with a bang and get one of their top athletes at one of their top clubs/markets.

Early stages, but interesting.

聽講Nike會幫手買辛祖
